title: 108_hr604
content: Worker Amnesty and Opportunity Act of 2003 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for legal permanent resident status for certain undocumented or nonimmigrant aliens who are: (1) alien workers in an employee-shortage occupation and sponsored by a labor organization. (2) eligible for admission at a US institution of higher education, or (3) at least 65 years old.
